title: River of Time
description: Unable to let go of the past, Maggie St.James' only desire is to "fix" her broken marriage. Confident she's found the way to travel through time, she makes a ridiculously dangerous plan.But will the benefits outweigh the risk? With every detail planned perfectly, she begins her journey.But there are two things she hadn't planned on: how to return to her own time...And meeting Logan Maddox.
author: Sharon Ricklin
